By utilising [[Strengthening Prescription: Chakra Injection|overpowered]] earth-based chakra, [[Gitai]] sends multiple tracking projectiles, which moving on the earth surface, to the target and will exploded. This technique is capable of causing a landslide due to damaging the earths surface, even the solid rock.
